漞字的基本解释

漞
mì
古同“汨”。
石名，可以做砚，产于中国甘肃陇西。

漞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mì］
［《廣韻》莫狄切，入錫，明。］
(1)同“汨”。
(2)石名。可做砚。产于甘肃省陇西。

漞字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　漞； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页646第11
【廣韻】【集韻】?莫狄切，音覓。與汨同。　又石名。可爲研。【米芾·硯史】通遠軍漞石硯。

漞字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
漞字的起名意思

暂无。

Tang
Basic explanation of words
Tang
mì
The ancient same as "Mi".
The name of the stone, which can be used as inkstone, is produced in Longxi, Gansu, China.
Tang
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mì］
["Guangyun" Modiqie, enter the tin, and Ming. ]
(1) Same as "汨".
(2) The name of the stone. Can do inkstone. Produced in Longxi, Gansu Province.
Tang
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　漞; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 646 No. 11
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Modic, Yinmi. Same as Mi.　Also stone name. Can be for research. 【Mi Fu·Inkstone History】Tongyuan Army Yanshi Inkstone.
Tang
